Title: I Am the Future
Writer: Grant Morrison (developed by), Brian Taylor (developed by), Brian Taylor (teleplay by), Grant Morrison (teleplay by), Matthew White (executive story editor), Ken Kristensen (story editor), Grant Morrison (based on the comic by), Darick Robertson (based on the comic by)
Actors: Christopher Meloni, Ritchie Coster, Lili Mirojnick, Medina Senghore
Plot: As Christmas approaches, Sax and Happy are locked in a climactic confrontation to rescue Hailey from Very Bad Santa's lair. Merry seeks to rescue Amanda from a dangerous foe.
